text: When you access 1-escorts.com Web site and affiliated Web sites (hereinafter referred to as Web sites), you agree to these Terms and conditions of use.
The Parties to this Agreement The parties to this Agreement ("the Agreement") Are you, ("User") and 1-escorts.com ("site").

Subject to the acceptance of the conditions set forth in this agreement, the site agrees to grant you a limited right of access to the contents of the 1-escorts.com and affiliated sites managed by the site.
This agreement may be modified at any time at the facility and the changes shall take effect upon notification to the users by posting on the Web sites or via a hyperlink.

Any action on its part to make the bookmark on the web where the warning page, the Check age page and/or the terms of Use page are not marked by an implicit acceptance of all the conditions set forth in this document, and by your explicit confirmation that you are an adult and not less than 18 years of age.

User Audit 2.1 All materials contained in Web sites should be considered only with the consent of adults in places where such materials do not violate any laws. This web site may be accessed not by persons below the age of 18 or by the minimum age established by law in their community.

You hereby confirm that you are aware that the content of the website is of a sexual nature; That you are familiar with this type of material; That you are not offended by such materials and that by accepting these terms and conditions, you deliberately and consciously seek access to these materials for your personal review.

User behavior 3.1 You agree to use Web sites according to the following code of conduct, and you agree and recognize that we can, but do not, have to reject or delete any material sent by you or sent by you that violates any of the following provisions and/or interrupt your right to use or access websites to violate these provisions:
You will not use the website to engage in any form of unlawful conduct, harassment or aggressive behaviour.
You will not use the Web site to violate the rights to privacy, property rights or other civil rights of any person.

You will not use the Web site in any way violating, plagiarisesing or violating the rights of any third party, including, but not limited to, any copyright or trademark law, confidentiality or other personal or property rights, or in any manner that is fraudulent or otherwise
You will not actively request site users in connection with your products or services, as well as with third parties, including by distributing spam.
will not transfer files containing viruses, spyware, trojans, or other malicious software Valid image formats are JPEG, GIF, or. SwF.
You will not post an invalid advertisement or list, as well as pictures with a high doctor, or images of others other than the ones you describe in your list or ad.
You will not be able to access or attempt to access the accounts of other advertisers or other users, or to infiltrate or attempt to penetrate the security measures of the site.

Right to ownership and infringement of copyright 4.1 You acknowledge and agree that all materials contained in the Web sites are property and constitute a valuable copyright, trademark and other intellectual property belonging to the site, or to other persons licensed or authorized to use such materials at the site.

All publications of the Web sites, as well as all materials and other matters which are directly or indirectly used in the framework of, through and/or with Web sites, are protected by the United Kingdom copyright law, International copyright treaties and other laws and regulations. All rights reserved.

You agree that you are not authorized to access, view, download, receive or otherwise use materials, directly or indirectly, in places where the site does not allow such access, browsing, downloading, receiving or otherwise using.
You hereby confirm and agree that the site does not allow access to any parts of the Web site in any way that circumvents the agreement.
